creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
text:
This module allow Lenya to deal with all nice xslt2.0 functionalities.

Simple to use, install and many fun !

creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
text:
Attachment failed (maybe too big ??). So, 

* archive can be download at : http://4sengines.eu/xslt2.0.tar.gz
* svn access at : http://svn.4sengines.eu/modcontrib/xslt2.0/trunk/lenya_2_0_X

Enjoy !

xslt2.0 module is now a part of Lenya svn contribution branch. 

See : http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lenya/contributions/2_0_X/modules/xslt2.0/
creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
